_comment: Each entry defines one custom field to extract from invoices.
_comment2: All three strategies (regex, table_keys, llm_hint) are optional — use any combination.
_comment3: regex: Python regex with ONE capture group for the value.
_comment4: table_keys: column header synonyms (lowercase) to look for in line item tables.
_comment5: llm_hint: description sent to the LLM — use plain English to describe where/how the field appears.

name: strata_reference
label: Strata Reference
llm_hint: A strata plan or lot reference, often labeled 'Strata Plan', 'SP' followed by digits, 'Strata Reference', or 'Lot' — common on strata levies and body corporate invoices

name: bsb
label: BSB
llm_hint: Bank BSB number, typically in the format XXX-XXX, found in payment or bank details sections
